video.title: Lost
video.synopsis: After their plane crashes on a deserted island, a diverse group of people must adapt to their new home and contend with the island's enigmatic forces.

episodes.synopsis: After a plane crash leaves 48 people stranded on an island, the survivors hope for a quick rescue, only to learn the island holds deep, dark secrets.
episodes.title: Pilot: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Having retrieved the plane transceiver, a group of survivors try to transmit a signal, only to receive a strange transmission from another inhabitant.
episodes.title: Pilot: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Jack and Hurley discover an alarming secret about Kate, and the marshal's life hangs in the balance.
episodes.title: Tabula Rasa

episodes.synopsis: Wild beasts invade the beach camp, while Kate and Michael join Locke on a hunt for food and a shocking secret about Locke is revealed.
episodes.title: Walkabout

episodes.synopsis: A sleep-deprived Jack struggles to overcome the haunting events that brought him to the island, while Boone gets caught in a treacherous riptide.
episodes.title: White Rabbit

episodes.synopsis: Only non-English-speaking Jin and Sun know how Michael was brutally beaten, while Kate, Jack, Sawyer and Sayid argue about where to camp.
episodes.title: House of the Rising Sun

episodes.synopsis: Charlie begins a journey of withdrawal from drugs aided by Locke, whose true motive is a mystery. Meanwhile, Jack is buried alive in a cave collapse.
episodes.title: The Moth

episodes.synopsis: When Shannon's inhaler runs out, Sawyer refuses to give up his extras, leaving Jack and Sayid to torture him until he agrees to reveal their location.
episodes.title: Confidence Man

episodes.synopsis: Sayid's life is in danger after finding the source of the French transmission, while Hurley hatches a ridiculous plan to make life more civilized.
episodes.title: Solitary

episodes.synopsis: Claire has a horribly realistic nightmare about her baby being harmed, while flashbacks reveal that her boyfriend got her pregnant and abandoned her.
episodes.title: Raised by Another

episodes.synopsis: After Charlie and Claire are abducted, a search party looks for them in the jungle, while Jack battles inner demons related to his father.
episodes.title: All the Best Cowboys Have Daddy Issues

episodes.synopsis: Jack, Kate and Sawyer fight over a briefcase that might contain clues about Kate's past. Sayid asks Shannon to translate notes from the French woman.
episodes.title: Whatever the Case May Be

episodes.synopsis: When Locke learns that Boone wants to share their secret with Shannon, Locke plans to teach him a lesson. Boone and Shannon's dark past is revealed.
episodes.title: Hearts and Minds

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious island beast reappears when Michael and Locke clash, while Sayid enlists Shannon to help decipher the French woman's map.
episodes.title: Special

episodes.synopsis: After Claire returns with no memory since the flight, Jack and Locke form a plan against her kidnapper, who threatens to kill the other survivors.
episodes.title: Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: Kate and Sawyer divulge dark secrets while tracking a renegade boar. Hurley and Sayid worry Charlie is losing it after his brush with death.
episodes.title: Outlaws

episodes.synopsis: When the raft the survivors have been building burns down, Michael accuses Jin of sabotage, while Sun stuns everyone with a surprising revelation.
episodes.title: ...In Translation

episodes.synopsis: Jack, Sayid and Charlie follow an obsessed Hurley into the jungle, where he flashes back to a life-altering experience before boarding the plane.
episodes.title: Numbers

episodes.synopsis: Locke thinks he knows how to get the hatch open, and he and Boone venture inland. Meanwhile, Jack is reluctant to help Sawyer get glasses.
episodes.title: Deus Ex Machina

episodes.synopsis: Jack aids a wounded Boone, while Locke deals with his guilt over the crisis. Meanwhile, Claire unexpectedly goes into labor while deep in the forest.
episodes.title: Do No Harm

episodes.synopsis: After another funeral, tempers flare as suspicion grows, and an unlikely survivor vows revenge. Sayid engages Locke in a game of cat-and-mouse.
episodes.title: The Greater Good

episodes.synopsis: When Michael falls seriously ill while building the raft, Jack suspects Sawyer and Kate of foul play since both will do anything to get the last seat.
episodes.title: Born to Run

episodes.synopsis: Rousseau shows up to camp with a dire warning about "the Others" and the black smoke, telling the survivors they need to run, hide... or die.
episodes.title: Exodus: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: After the raft leaves, the remaining survivors scramble to flee the black smoke, while Claire panics, knowing that "the Others" are after her baby.
episodes.title: Exodus: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: As Sawyer and Michael argue on the raft, the survivors try to blow open the hatch, while flashbacks reveal their final moments before the flight.
episodes.title: Exodus: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Jack, Locke and Kate explore the mysterious hatch, while Shannon chases after Vincent the dog and encounters a familiar face in the jungle.
episodes.title: Man of Science, Man of Faith

episodes.synopsis: Michael and Sawyer fight for their lives on the high seas and discover a new predator. On land, Locke descends into the hatch to find a missing Kate.
episodes.title: Adrift

episodes.synopsis: Jack, Locke and Kate learn more about the hatch. After being beaten and taken captive, Sawyer, Michael and Jin wonder if their captors are the Others.
episodes.title: Orientation

episodes.synopsis: Hurley struggles with a task inside the hatch as he flashes back to disturbing memories, while Sawyer and the others learn their captors' identities.
episodes.title: Everybody Hates Hugo

episodes.synopsis: Michael goes into the jungle to find Walt, but discovers he's not alone, while Sawyer and Jin's captors demand to be taken to the camp.
episodes.title: ...And Found

episodes.synopsis: Sawyer's wound becomes life threatening as he, Michael and Jin make their way through the interior of the island with the tail section survivors.
episodes.title: Abandoned

episodes.synopsis: The harrowing first 48 days of the tail-section survivors are revealed. Flashbacks show points of view from Ana-Lucia, Mr. Eko, Bernard and Libby.
episodes.title: The Other 48 Days

episodes.synopsis: Violence erupts when Ana Lucia and her group hold Sayid and the other castaways captive, while flashbacks reveal her troubled life.
episodes.title: Collision

episodes.synopsis: Kate's original crime is revealed, while she thinks something is haunting her through Sawyer. Locke and Eko make a discovery about the film.
episodes.title: What Kate Did

episodes.synopsis: Claire loses faith in Charlie after Eko questions him about the Virgin Mary statue, and Kate gives the recovering Sawyer a much-needed haircut.
episodes.title: The 23rd Psalm

episodes.synopsis: Jack, Locke and Sawyer follow a determined Michael as he heads into the jungle toward the dreaded Others in search of Walt.
episodes.title: The Hunting Party

episodes.synopsis: When Charlie's vivid dreams lead him to believe Aaron is in danger, Locke suspects he is using again. Sawyer encourages Hurley to move on Libby.
episodes.title: Fire + Water

episodes.synopsis: When Sun is greatly injured during a failed kidnapping attempt, some of the island survivors fear that the Others may have returned.
episodes.title: The Long Con

episodes.synopsis: After Sun is attacked, the survivors think that one of their own might be an Other. Sawyer uncovers Hurley's breach of trust and blackmails him.
episodes.title: One of Them

episodes.synopsis: When baby Aaron contracts a mysterious illness, a desperate Claire, Kate and Danielle return to where Claire was kidnapped hoping to find a cure.
episodes.title: Maternity Leave

episodes.synopsis: Locke calls in Ana Lucia to interrogate Henry Gale about the balloon that brought him to the island, while Sun realizes that she might be pregnant.
episodes.title: The Whole Truth

episodes.synopsis: When the hatch takes on a life of its own, Locke enlists the help of an unlikely ally. Ana-Lucia, Sayid and Charlie seek the truth about Henry Gale.
episodes.title: Lockdown

episodes.synopsis: Libby offers support to Hurley, who thinks the island is having a strange effect on him after he starts seeing his friend from the mental institution.
episodes.title: Dave

episodes.synopsis: Rose is opposed to Bernard's plan to create an SOS signal. Romantic sparks reignite between Jack and Kate as they propose a trade with the Others.
episodes.title: S.O.S.

episodes.synopsis: After finding an exhausted Michael in the forest, Jack and Kate bring him back to the main camp, where he reveals new details about the Others.
episodes.title: Two for the Road

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Eko dreams about his brother leading him somewhere and seeks Locke's help finding the location, while Jack grapples with a situation in the hatch.
Michael convinces Jack to help him rescue Walt. Locke is in charge of the hatch and risks everyone's safety in deciding if he should push the button.
episodes.title: Three Minutes

episodes.synopsis: After discovering something odd offshore, Jack and Sayid hatch a plan to confront the Others to get Walt back. Meanwhile, Eko and Locke come to blows.
episodes.title: Live Together, Die Alone: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: An armed Michael, Jack, Kate, James and Hurley approach the Others by land, while Sayid, Sun and Jin attack by sea. Desmond's backstory is revealed.
episodes.title: Live Together, Die Alone: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Jack, Kate and Sawyer are kidnapped by the Others, who reveal themselves to be more sophisticated and savvy than anyone guessed.
episodes.title: A Tale of Two Cities

episodes.synopsis: Sun and Jin's lives are in danger when Sayid tries to locate Jack and the other castaways. Sayid also plans to get the attention of the Others.
episodes.title: The Glass Ballerina

episodes.synopsis: Locke, Eko and Desmond are scattered after the hatch's implosion, and Locke gets a message from the Island asking him to fix the situation he caused.
episodes.title: Further Instructions

episodes.synopsis: The Others prevent Sawyer and Kate from escaping, while Jack is asked to use his medical training to save the life of one of the Others.
episodes.title: Every Man for Himself

episodes.synopsis: A crazed Eko wrestles his demons while some of the castaways go to the Pearl station to find a computer they can use to locate Jack, Kate and Sawyer.
episodes.title: The Cost of Living

episodes.synopsis: Sawyer's life is in danger when Pickett decides to make good on his threat. Locke discovers a hidden message that may unlock the island's secrets.
episodes.title: I Do

episodes.synopsis: The fate of Ben's life is in Jack's hands, while Kate and Sawyer help Alex in return for a boat. Juliet makes a decision that endangers her standing.
episodes.title: Not in Portland

episodes.synopsis: After Desmond rescues Claire from drowning, Charlie gets Hurley to help him find out why Desmond can predict the future.
episodes.title: Flashes Before Your Eyes

episodes.synopsis: A power play ensues between Jack and Ben as Juliet's future hangs in the balance, while Kate and Sawyer deal with the consequences of their escape.
episodes.title: Stranger in a Strange Land

episodes.synopsis: Kate struggles over their decision to leave Jack in the hands of the Others, while Hurley finds a van and uses it to help a survivor in need of hope.
episodes.title: Tricia Tanaka Is Dead

episodes.synopsis: On their mission to rescue Jack, Kate, Sayid and Locke stumble upon a mysterious structure surrounded by farm animals and meet its strange inhabitant.
episodes.title: Enter 77

episodes.synopsis: Claire has an idea to send a message to the outside world. Charlie, however, is resistant to the idea, and Desmond tries to sabotage the plan.
episodes.title: Par Avion

episodes.synopsis: When Locke and Kate arrive at the Others' camp, Ben promises to tell Locke the island's secrets as long as he stops his destructive plan.
episodes.title: The Man from Tallahassee

episodes.synopsis: When Paulo and Nikki apparently die, the castaways try to figure out what happened to them. Flashbacks show what they were doing before the crash.
episodes.title: Exposé

episodes.synopsis: The Others are leaving, and one castaway is going with them. Kate is knocked out and wakes up handcuffed to Juliet, and determines to get Jack.
episodes.title: Left Behind

episodes.synopsis: Jack returns, but no one wants to celebrate when they see that Juliet is with him. Flashbacks show her life before and after arriving on the island.
episodes.title: One of Us

episodes.synopsis: Desmond convinces Hurley, Jin and Charlie to follow him into the jungle after having visions. Flashbacks reveal when Desmond spent time with monks.
episodes.title: Catch 22

episodes.synopsis: Sun learns what happens to pregnant women on the island and Juliet takes her to the Staff in order to learn the baby's date of conception (D.O.C.).
episodes.title: D.O.C

episodes.synopsis: After abandoning the Others, Locke helps Sawyer eliminate a common enemy. At the beach, parachutist Naomi has crucial information about Flight 815.
episodes.title: The Brig

episodes.synopsis: Locke confronts Ben and demands to be taken to Jacob. Ben remembers his childhood on the island, revealing the history of the Dharma Initiative.
episodes.title: The Man Behind the Curtain

episodes.synopsis: Once again, Desmond foresees Charlie's death, but this time Charlie faces it head on. Jack devises a plan to fight back when the Others arrive.
episodes.title: Greatest Hits

episodes.synopsis: The ambush on the Others ends with Sayid, Jin and Bernard being captured. Ben sends Mikhail to deal with Charlie at the Looking Glass station.
episodes.title: Through the Looking Glass: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Ben confronts Jack, claiming that Naomi is not who she seems. Inside the Looking Glass, Charlie and Desmond try to shut off the blocking signal.
episodes.title: Through the Looking Glass: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The survivors think a rescue team is close, but they struggle to believe Charlie's final message that they are not who they seem to be.
episodes.title: The Beginning of the End

episodes.synopsis: Hurley lets it slip that he saw Jacob's shack. Locke also reveals who he is taking orders from. Jack and Kate go to find one of the Others.
episodes.title: Confirmed Dead

episodes.synopsis: Sayid goes with Kate and Miles to the barracks to make a deal with Locke, while flash-forwards show Sayid in Berlin with a new job as a killer.
episodes.title: The Economist

episodes.synopsis: Kate takes matters into her own hands to get information out of the camp's hostage, only to cause problems with the camp's new leader: Locke.
episodes.title: Eggtown

episodes.synopsis: On the way to the freighter, the survivors on the helicopter hit some turbulence. At the beach, Jack wants to know why Desmond thinks it's 1996.
episodes.title: The Constant

episodes.synopsis: Juliet gets a surprising visit from someone from her past. She is given orders to stop Charlotte and Faraday from doing what they have set out to do.
episodes.title: The Other Woman

episodes.synopsis: Juliet reveals startling news to Jin when Sun decides to move to Locke's camp. On the freighter, Sayid and Desmond meet the ship's captain.
episodes.title: Ji Yeon

episodes.synopsis: After Sayid encounters Michael, the tale of how Ben's spy got to the freighter is revealed. Back at camp, Ben sends daughter Alex to a safer place.
episodes.title: Meet Kevin Johnson

episodes.synopsis: The body of the doctor from the freighter washes up on shore, while at Locke's camp, he, Sawyer, Hurley and Aaron get a warning sign.
episodes.title: The Shape Of Things To Come

episodes.synopsis: Kate and Juliet must work together when Jack falls ill. Something goes wrong as Sawyer, Claire, Aaron and Miles trek away from Locke's camp.
episodes.title: Something Nice Back Home

episodes.synopsis: Locke, Hurley and Ben try to find Jacob's cabin. When they do, Locke enters the cabin alone and meets Christian, who is speaking on Jacob's behalf.
episodes.title: Cabin Fever

episodes.synopsis: In the future, Jack, Kate, Sayid, Sun and Hurley reunite with loved ones. At a press conference, they lie about what happened on the island.
episodes.title: There's No Place Like Home: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: In the present, Ben tries to escape so he and Locke can follow through with Jacob's request, while Michael tries to neutralize explosives on the boat.
episodes.title: There's No Place Like Home: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: As the face-off between the survivors and the freighter people continues, Jack, Kate, Sayid, Sun, Hurley and Aaron find themselves closer to rescue.
episodes.title: There's No Place Like Home: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Several of the Oceanic 6 survivors come to grips with their need to return to the island -- on their own terms.
episodes.title: Because You Left

episodes.synopsis: Hurley and Sayid are hunted down by cops. Jack and Ben try to bring everyone together. Kate receives help from an old friend to hide the truth.
episodes.title: The Lie

episodes.synopsis: Desmond searches for a mysterious woman who can stop the island's time movements. Locke uncovers the person responsible for attacking the victims.
episodes.title: Jughead

episodes.synopsis: Kate discovers that someone knows the secret of Aaron's parental lineage, while the time shifts place the lives of the remaining survivors in peril.
episodes.title: The Little Prince

episodes.synopsis: Locke takes on the burden of stopping the increasingly violent time shifts. Ben hits a roadblock in bringing the Oceanic 6 back to the island.
episodes.title: This Place Is Death

episodes.synopsis: The way back to the island is revealed to members of the Oceanic 6, but there's trouble ahead when not all of them wish to return.
Locke's fateful mission off the island under the name Jeremy Bentham is revealed.
episodes.title: The Life and Death of Jeremy Bentham

episodes.synopsis: Sawyer perpetrates a lie to protect the remaining survivors from the mistakes of the past.
episodes.title: LaFleur

episodes.synopsis: After meeting old acquaintances, Sawyer is forced to continue lying to protect them.
episodes.title: Namaste

episodes.synopsis: Everyone on the island is at risk when one of the survivors decides to go against them and take matters into his own hands.
episodes.title: He's Our You

episodes.synopsis: Kate, Sawyer and Juliet try to save Ben. Kate starts to tell the truth about the lie in order to keep Aaron from harm.
episodes.title: Whatever Happened, Happened

episodes.synopsis: To atone for sins of the past, Ben must attempt to summon the smoke monster in order to be judged.
episodes.title: Dead Is Dead

episodes.synopsis: Suspicions about a breach intensify after Ben is taken from the infirmary, and a reluctant Miles works with Hurley to deliver an important package.
episodes.title: Some Like It Hoth

episodes.synopsis: The time of reckoning has begun as Daniel Faraday comes clean regarding what he knows about the island.
episodes.title: The Variable

episodes.synopsis: Jack and Kate are at odds over how to save their fellow survivors, while Locke further solidifies his stance as leader of the Others.
episodes.title: Follow the Leader

episodes.synopsis: Jack's decision to put a plan in action to set things right on the island is met with some strong resistance by those close to him.
episodes.title: The Incident: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: At the site of the Taweret statue remains, Locke assigns Ben a difficult task that involves Jacob's fate.
episodes.title: The Incident: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The aftermath from the detonation of the hydrogen bomb is revealed.
episodes.title: LA X: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The man impersonating John Locke reveals his true intentions.
episodes.title: LA X: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Kate finds herself on the run; Jack must do something that may endanger a friend's life.
episodes.title: What Kate Does

episodes.synopsis: Locke goes in search of help to further his cause.
episodes.title: The Substitute

episodes.synopsis: Hurley tries to persuade Jack to go with him on an unspecified mission; Jin has an encounter with an old friend.
episodes.title: Lighthouse

episodes.synopsis: Sayid faces a difficult decision; Claire sends a warning to the temple inhabitants.
episodes.title: Sundown

episodes.synopsis: Ben deals with the consequences of an uncovered lie.
episodes.title: Dr. Linus

episodes.synopsis: John Locke assigns Sawyer a mission.
episodes.title: Recon

episodes.synopsis: Richard must make a difficult decision.
episodes.title: Ab Aeterno

episodes.synopsis: Sun and Jin continue to search for each other; Locke confronts his enemy.
episodes.title: The Package

episodes.synopsis: Desmond wakes up and realizes he is back on the island.
episodes.title: Happily Ever After

episodes.synopsis: Hurley agonizes over what the group's next move should be; Locke is curious about the new arrival in his camp.
episodes.title: Everybody Loves Hugo

episodes.synopsis: Alliances are forged and broken as Locke and Jack merge their camps.
episodes.title: The Last Recruit

episodes.synopsis: When asked to perform a difficult task, Jack must decide whether or not to trust Locke.
episodes.title: The Candidate

episodes.synopsis: Locke's motives are finally explained.
episodes.title: Across the Sea

episodes.synopsis: Locke devises a new strategy; Jack's group searches for Desmond.
episodes.title: What they Died For

episodes.synopsis: The series concludes. Battle lines are drawn as Locke puts his plan into action, which could finally liberate him from the island.
episodes.title: The End
